documentation.content:
## YAML Invalid Tag Shorthands Example

```yaml
%TAG !e! tag:example,2000:app/
---
- !e! foo
- !h!bar baz
```

## YAML Invalid Verbatim Tags Example

```yaml
- !<!> foo
- !<$:?> bar
```

## YAML 1.2 Invalid Repeated YAML Directive

```yaml
%YAML 1.2
%YAML 1.1
foo
```

## YAML 1.2 Invalid Repeated YAML Directive

```error
ERROR:
The YAML directive must only be
given at most once per document.
```

## YAML Invalid Use of Reserved Indicators Example

```yaml
commercial-at: @text
grave-accent: `text
```

## YAML Invalid Use of Reserved Indicators Example

```text
ERROR:
 Reserved indicators can't
 start a plain scalar.
```

## YAML 1.2 Invalid Repeated TAG Directive

```yaml
%TAG ! !foo
%TAG ! !foo
bar
```

## YAML 1.2 Invalid Repeated TAG Directive

```text
ERROR:
The TAG directive must only
be given at most once per
handle in the same document.
```

## YAML Flow Folding Example

```yaml
"↓
··foo·↓
·↓
··→·bar↓
↓
··baz↓ "

```

## YAML Flow Folding Example

```yaml
%YAML 1.2
---
!!str " foo\nbar\nbaz "

```

## YAML Complex Mapping Key Example

```yaml
? - Detroit Tigers
  - Chicago cubs
:
  - 2001-07-23

? [ New York Yankees,
    Atlanta Braves ]
: [ 2001-07-02, 2001-08-12,
    2001-08-14 ]
```

## Single-Quoted Lines Example (YAML)

```yaml
'·1st non-empty↓
↓
·2nd non-empty·
→3rd non-empty·'

```

## YAML Multi-Line Comments Example

```yaml
key:····# Comment↓
········# lines↓
  value↓
↓

```

## YAML Multi-Line Comments Example

```yaml
%YAML 1.2
---
!!map {
  ? !!str "key"
  : !!str "value",
}

```

## Single-Quoted Style Example (YAML)

```yaml
'here''s to "quotes"'

```
